bug.author: timnon
bug.summary: wrong import in example in release notes 0.4.5
bug.description:
The import <denchmark-code>from WordEmbeddingsStore import WordEmbeddingsStore </denchmark-code>
in the release notes for release 0.4.5 and issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/flairNLP/flair/pull/1315>#1315</denchmark-link> is wrong. As in the docstring, it should be: <denchmark-code>from flair.inference_utils import WordEmbeddingsStore </denchmark-code>
Just to make sure that nobody gets frustrated when trying

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/timnon>@timnon</denchmark-link> thanks for spotting this! Just fixed it!
